title: Calming Potion
summaries: The Calming Potion is a buff potion which grants the Calm buff when consumed. While under its effects, the enemy spawn rate is reduced by (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 39% / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 17% and the maximum number of enemies on-screen is reduced by (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 40% / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 20%. This lasts for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 12 minutes / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 8 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).
This potion does not reduce enemy spawn rates during the <linked>Pumpkin Moon</linked>, <linked>Frost Moon</linked>, or <linked>Frost Legion</linked> <linked>events</linked>.
